sentence0.sentece_text: Glycine (5-10 mM) completely eliminated the depolarizing response of the C-cell, whereas the hyperpolarizing component was unaffected.

sentence1.sentece_text: In contrast, gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA; 5-10 mM) had no obvious effect on either component.

sentence2.sentece_text: The C-cell light response was modified in two stages by cis-2,3-piperidine dicarboxylic acid (cis-PDA; 0.5-5 mM): first the depolarizing response disappeared; then the membrane potential hyperpolarized concomitant with a large reduction or elimination of the hyperpolarizing light response.
